00007 #define QT_CONNECT(sender, signal, receiver, slot)\
00008     if (!QObject::connect(sender, signal, receiver, slot))\
00009     {\
00010         std::stringstream error;\
00011         error << "Unable to connect signal " << signal << " from sender " << sender << " to slot " << slot << " on receiver " << receiver;\
00012         throw std::logic_error(error.str());\
00013     }\
00014 
00015 #define QT_DISCONNECT(sender, signal, receiver, slot)\
00016     if (!QObject::disconnect(sender, signal, receiver, slot))\
00017     {\
00018         std::stringstream error;\
00019         error << "Unable to cdisconnect signal " << signal << " from sender " << sender << " to slot " << slot << " on receiver " << receiver;\
00020         throw std::logic_error(error.str());\
00021     }\
